kw.name: Comment
kw.arg: Log in using a valid standard user and confirm successful login

kw.name: Comment
kw.arg: Wait until the inventory/product listing page is fully loaded

Comment
kw.arg: Randomly select 4 products from the available 6 to simulate varied user behavior
kw.doc: Displays the given messages in the log file as keyword arguments.

kw.name: Comment

test.doc: Randomly select 4 out of the 6 listed products and fetch their names and prices.
